channel.title: Tom Probyn's personal website
channel.description: Tom Probyn's personal website, for anything I find marginally interesting and worth sharing.

item.title: Complete website rebuild!
item.description: Since getting an entirely new URL for the site, I decided to entirely re-build and restructure it. Now, everything is built on Markdown and compiled to HTML using a Python Script, and the process of writing is significantly smoother than it was before (having to wrangle with HTML manually). There aren't too many user-facing changes (apart from the new structure and URL) so you should still feel comfortable navigating, but do stop by the entirely new home page and have a good old poke around!

item.title: Problem solving and the transmitter map
item.description: In which I slowly loose the pithy little that remains of my sanity trying to find an excel document published as a PDF from 2007, and shoehorn the data into Google Earth. About as nail-biting as it gets round here!

item.title: The new site is complete(ish)
item.description: Please look out for any broken links and send an E-Mail if you find one!
